MonsterTrait.Name: Multiattack

MonsterAction.Name: Claws
MonsterAction.Text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6+2) slashing damage.

MonsterAction.Name: Spear
